channel.title: CVE Feed for ifmeorg -- ifme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ifmeorg -- ifme

item.title: CVE-2021-25988|2024-09-17T01:05:32.496Z -- ifmeorg -- ifme
item.description: In “ifme”, versions 1.0.0 to v7.31.4 are vulnerable against stored XSS vulnerability (notifications section) which can be directly triggered by sending an ally request to the admin.

item.title: CVE-2021-25989|2024-09-17T01:20:33.578Z -- ifmeorg -- ifme
item.description: In “ifme”, versions 1.0.0 to v7.31.4 are vulnerable against stored XSS vulnerability in the markdown editor. It can be exploited by making a victim a Leader of a group which triggers the payload for them.
